Class StaffMenuView

Object
StaffMenuView
public class StaffMenuView extends Object
view class responsible for displaying and managing staff-facing menu actions allows staff members to approve or reject users, internships, and withdrawal requests, as well as view, filter, and report on internship and application records

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private final InternshipBrowserView
    browserView
    shared browser view used for report and filtering features
    private static final Scanner
    sc
    scanner used to capture administrator console input
    private final StaffController
    staffController
    controller handling staff-related business logic and data operations

    shorten text for table display, appending ellipsis when truncated

    private void
    manageCompanyReps()
    display and review all company representatives whose accounts are pending approval enables staff to approve or reject selected applicants
    private void
    manageInternships()
    display list of internships pending approval and allow staff to inspect, approve, or reject selected internship postings
    private void
    manageWithdrawals()
    display and resolve pending withdrawal requests for internship applications allows staff to approve or reject each selected request
    private void
    viewAllApplications()
    display all internships and allow staff to view all submitted applications includes expanded application details and inspection option

      Parameters:

      Parameters:

      max - maximum characters allowed in output
      Returns:
